Uses of Class
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes.Arc

Packages that use Arc
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes Provides support for geometric calculations based on shapes. 
 

Uses of Arc in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes that return Arc
 Arc RoundedRectangle.getBottomLeft()
          Returns the bottom left Arc of this RoundedRectangle.
 Arc RoundedRectangle.getBottomRight()
          Returns the bottom right Arc of this RoundedRectangle.
 Arc RoundedRectangle.getTopLeft()
          Returns the top left Arc of this RoundedRectangle.
 Arc RoundedRectangle.getTopRight()
          Returns the top right Arc of this RoundedRectangle.
 

Methods in org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes with parameters of type Arc
 Point[] Polygon.getIntersections(Arc arc)
          Returns the points of intersection between this Polygon and the given Arc arc.
 Point[] Line.getIntersections(Arc arc)
           
 Point[] Ellipse.getIntersections(Arc arc)
          Calculates the points of intersection of this Ellipse and the given Arc.
 Point[] CubicCurve.getIntersections(Arc arc)
          Returns the points of intersection between this CubicCurve and the given Arc.
 Point[] Arc.getIntersections(Arc other)
          Returns the points of intersection between this Arc and the given other Arc.
